column1: '''''The Tolkien Calendar 1993''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[Grafton]] on [[9 July]] [[1992]]. It features art by [[Alan Lee]] based on ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.
* January - "[[:File:Alan Lee - The Shadow of the Past.jpg
* April - "[[:File:Alan Lee - The Mirror of Galadriel.jpg
* August - "[[:File:Alan Lee - The Battle of the Hornburg.jpg
* November - "[[:File:Alan Lee - The Siege of Gondor.jpg
* ''[[The 1993 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar]]'', published in the USA
* [http://tolkiencalendars.com/1993_1995.html Tolkien Calendars 1993 - 1995] at [http://tolkiencalendars.com/ The Compleat Gyde to Tolkien Calendars]
